text: Francisco Javier Echeverría (c. 2 July 1797 – 17 September 1852) was a Mexican businessman and finance minister who served as interim president of Mexico for about two weeks in late September 1841, during the fall of Anastasio Bustamante’s administration. Category:1797 births Category:1852 deaths Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:People from Veracruz
title: Francisco Javier Echeverría
